parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. Specify a value in the YYYYMMDD format.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Valid values:

*   **zh** (default): Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: Order
parameters.description:
The field based on which you want to sort the query results. Valid values:

*   **resourceId**
*   **trafficDay**

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: 10. Maximum value: 50.

parameters.name: SearchItem
parameters.description: The instance ID or the IP address of the asset.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify a value in the YYYYMMDD format.

parameters.name: TrafficType
parameters.description:
The traffic type. This parameter is required. Valid values:

*   **EIP_TRAFFIC**: traffic for the Internet firewall.
*   **NatGateway_TRAFFIC**: traffic for NAT firewalls.
*   **VPC_TRAFFIC**: traffic for virtual private cloud (VPC) firewalls.
